languages.text: "Сейчас мы — ослепшее, обесточенное, беззащитное и тонущее в бездне корыто. Общий объем отключений совсем чуть-чуть не дотянул до того, чтобы превратить нас в адамантиумный гроб".
"Right now, we are a blind, unpowered, defenceless, sinking spittoon drifting through the abyss. The total volume of outages was nearly enough to turn us into an adamantine casket."
languages.original_text: "Сейчас мы — ослепшее, обесточенное, беззащитное и тонущее в бездне корыто. Общий объем отключений совсем чуть-чуть не дотянул до того, чтобы превратить нас в адамантиумный гроб".

traits.locale_text: "Right now we are a blind, unpowered, defenceless and sinking spittoon drifting through the abyss. The total volume of outages fell just short of turning us into an adamantium casket."
"Right now we are a blind, unpowered, defenceless and sinking spittoon drifting through the abyss. The total volume of outages fell just short of turning us into an adamantium casket."
"Right now, we are a blind, unpowered, defenceless, sinking spittoon drifting through the abyss. The total volume of outages was nearly enough to turn us into an adamantine casket."
"Right now, we are a blind, unpowered, defenceless, sinking spittoon drifting through the abyss. The total volume of outages was nearly enough to turn us into an adamantine casket."
"Right now, we are a blind, unpowered, defenceless, sinking spittoon drifting through the abyss. The total volume of outages was nearly enough to turn us into an adamantine casket."
"Right now, we are a blind, unpowered, defenceless, sinking spittoon drifting through the abyss. The total volume of outages was nearly enough to turn us into an adamantine casket."

languages.text: «Ahora mismo somos una bañera ciega, sin energía, indefensa y al borde del colapso que flota a la deriva en el abismo. Ha faltado poco para convertirnos en un féretro adamantino».
languages.original_text: "Right now, we are a blind, unpowered, defenceless, sinking spittoon drifting through the abyss. The total volume of outages was nearly enough to turn us into an adamantine casket."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora mismo somos una bañera ciega, sin energía, indefensa y al borde del colapso que flota a la deriva en el abismo. Ha faltado poco para convertirnos en un féretro adamantino».

languages.text: 「今の私たちは、何も見えず、何の力もなく、丸腰で、奈落の底を漂う沈没寸前の肥溜め状態です。あれだけの停電が起きたせいで、こちらはもはやアダマンチウムの棺桶ですよ」
languages.original_text: "Right now, we are a blind, unpowered, defenceless, sinking spittoon drifting through the abyss. The total volume of outages was nearly enough to turn us into an adamantine casket."

traits.locale_text: 「今の私たちは、何も見えず、何の力もなく、丸腰で、奈落の底を漂う沈没寸前の肥溜め状態です。あれだけの停電が起きたせいで、こちらはもはやアダマンチウムの棺桶ですよ」

languages.text: “这艘船雷达失灵，失去了动力，也没有任何防御能力。它就像个不断下沉的痰桶一样，在深渊里四处漂流。发生了那么多故障，这艘船简直变成了精金做成的棺材。”
languages.original_text: "Right now, we are a blind, unpowered, defenceless, sinking spittoon drifting through the abyss. The total volume of outages was nearly enough to turn us into an adamantine casket."

traits.locale_text: “这艘船雷达失灵，失去了动力，也没有任何防御能力。它就像个不断下沉的痰桶一样，在深渊里四处漂流。发生了那么多故障，这艘船简直变成了精金做成的棺材。”

languages.text: "Im Moment sind wir ein blinder, stromloser, wehrloser, sinkender Spucknapf, der durch den Abgrund treibt. Es sind so viele Systeme ausgefallen, dass wir schon fast einem Sarg aus Adamant gleichen."
languages.original_text: "Right now, we are a blind, unpowered, defenceless, sinking spittoon drifting through the abyss. The total volume of outages was nearly enough to turn us into an adamantine casket."

traits.locale_text: "Im Moment sind wir ein blinder, stromloser, wehrloser, sinkender Spucknapf, der durch den Abgrund treibt. Es sind so viele Systeme ausgefallen, dass wir schon fast einem Sarg aus Adamant gleichen."

languages.text: « Pour l'instant, on est rien de plus qu'un tas de ferraille aveugle et sans défense qui dérive dans les abysses. Vu la quantité de pannes, c'est même un miracle que le vaisseau se soit pas déjà transformé en cercueil d'adamantine. »
languages.original_text: "Right now, we are a blind, unpowered, defenceless, sinking spittoon drifting through the abyss. The total volume of outages was nearly enough to turn us into an adamantine casket."

traits.locale_text: « Pour l'instant, on est rien de plus qu'un tas de ferraille aveugle et sans défense qui dérive dans les abysses. Vu la quantité de pannes, c'est même un miracle que le vaisseau se soit pas déjà transformé en cercueil d'adamantine. »

languages.text: "Şu an boşlukta sürüklenen kör, gücü kesilmiş, savunmasız, batmak üzere olan bir tükürük hokkasıyız. Yaşanan güç kayıplarının bizi adamantin bir tabuta dönüştürmesine ramak kalmıştı."
languages.original_text: "Right now, we are a blind, unpowered, defenceless, sinking spittoon drifting through the abyss. The total volume of outages was nearly enough to turn us into an adamantine casket."
